name: Escape Horizon (YosemiteMark)
description:
Navigate your ship back home,  using only the gravitational forces of White and Black Holes

Created in seven days for Brackey's Game Jam 2020.1 - my first Game Jam ever!

Credits:

Programming,  Graphics, and Sound Effects by YosemiteMark

Sound Effects created using JFXR (https://jfxr.frozenfractal.com/)

Music by Eric Matyas (www.soundimage.org)

Font by Tony de Marco/Monica Rizzoli
(https://fonts.google.com/specimen/Tomorrow)
Released under the Open Font License

Asteroid texture by Joao Paulo
(https://3dtextures.me/)
Released under Creative Commons CC0 License
